text: MFK Detva is a Slovak association football club located in Detva.MFK DETVA 31.07.2016, futbalnet.sk It plays in 3. liga (3rd level). == Colors and badge == Its colors are white and green. == Current squad == As of 1.5.2018 ==External links== *Official club website * *Futbalnet profile *MFK Detva on Náš futbal portal ==References== Category:Football clubs in Slovakia Category:Association football clubs established in 1936
title: MFK Detva
